result.eng: I just said that for fun.
result.ga: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.orig: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.html: Ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.ga: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.orig: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.html: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinnThat man was only joking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ an fear sin aċ ar ẛon grinnThat man was only joking.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
